title: 怎么开启超级稿子模式
author: _CAI_

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
裝 WorldEdit ... 
http://wiki.sk89q.com/wiki/WorldEdit

Super pickaxe 指令
//                          Toggle the super pick axe.
/sp single                          Switch to single block super pickaxe mode.
/sp area         <range>                  Switch to area super pickaxe mode.
/sp recur         <Range>                  Switch to recursive super pickaxe mode.

replies.author: 火星蚂蚁
replies.txt_content: 完全搞不懂什么意思    多人联机的超级稿子模式 .....汗  神马意思啊

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 超级稿子。。。。well很吊啊，什么都知道，看那351爱心真让我羡慕嫉妒恨，比某老灌水的版主好多了。。。

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 输入/superpickaxe 要不就下个hackclient 里面自带秒方块
